item.title: Movie barcodes of Dileesh Pothan movies
item.description: Movie barcodes of Dileesh Pothan movies Dileesh Pothan is already a rocking star in the Malayalam movie industry for his outstanding movies. Within just three films, he already owns a place in the minds of movie buffs. Subtle details and realistic presentation of stories are popularly known as Pothettan brilliance.His works with Fahad Faasil are a treat to watch. Apart from directorial skills, he is also known for his produced movies.
